attributes.action: Make Dr Helen Sharman and Tim Peake knights of the realm for services to science
attributes.background: I think it's a crying shame that Dr Helen Sharman hasn't been recognised for her services to science. She was our first astronaut. Tim Peake is our first astronaut on the International Space Station and the first Brit to do a space walk. Dame Helen and Sir Tim, arise!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
